de.fhb.sailboat.control

Interface Planner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MissionTransmitter, PlannerImpl

    public interface Planner
    Interface for executing a Mission. Implementations are responsible for arranging the order of the Task elements of the Mission and the execution of the tasks.
    Author:
    hscheel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String WAIT_TIME_PROPERTY
      Name of the property defining the wait time between two planning cycles.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doMission(Mission mission)
      Executes a mission by executing the tasks it contains.
      void doPrimitiveCommand(PrimitiveCommandTask task)
      Executes a primitive command directly.
      void stop()
      Stops executing the current mission.

    • Field Detail

      • WAIT_TIME_PROPERTY

        static final java.lang.String WAIT_TIME_PROPERTY
        Name of the property defining the wait time between two planning cycles.

    • Method Detail

      • doMission

        void doMission(Mission mission)
        Executes a mission by executing the tasks it contains. The sequence of the tasks may change during execution. Calling this while another mission is executed will cause stopping the old mission and executing the new one.
        Parameters:
        mission - the mission to be executed

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops executing the current mission. To avoid the boat being pushed around without control, it will try to hold its current position.

      • doPrimitiveCommand

        void doPrimitiveCommand(PrimitiveCommandTask task)
        Executes a primitive command directly. Calling this while a mission is executed will cause stopping the mission and executing the task.
        Parameters:
        task - the primitive task to be executed
